job.title: Data Scientist - Sam's Club
job.description: stronguPosition Summary What Youll DobrbrustrongData Scientists in the Sams Club Technology division specialize in applying machine learning and artificial intelligence to solve problems across Merchandising Marketing Club Operations Finance eCommerce and Security You will have the opportunity to work with a high caliber team from a variety of disciplines to build new software and radically change our business Data Scientists work as part of an Experience Team to develop and deploy advanced algorithms at scale You will support and enable the entire project lifecycle including problem discovery with business clients algorithmic design coding validation deployment testing and monitoring Data Scientists adhere to agile software development standards through rapid prototyping iterative development and incremental deployment of capabilities Development is performed in Sprints and Data Scientists are held accountable to engineering excellence standardsbrbrKey ResponsibilitiesbrulliPerforms research and applies new techniques and concepts to solve problemsliliUnderstands and translates business and functional needs into AIML problem statementsliliDevelops custom ML models to drive innovative business solutionsliliManages and integrates complex data sets from multiple disparate data sourcesliliWrites complex queries and extracts data to build robust data pipelinesliliCollaborates with Engineering teams to integrate algorithms into tools processes and interfacesliliPerforms exploratory data analysis and develops models to identify trends and opportunitiesliliBuilds and deploys reusable services and utilities that can be leveraged by a wide range of applicationsliliApplies innovative and scientific approaches to augment and automate business decisionsbrliulstronguSkillsbrustrongulliProficiency in machine learning algorithms such as multiclass classifications decision trees support vector machines deep learning and anomaly detectionliliStrong understanding of probability and statistical models generative and descriptive modelsliliAbility to run experiments scientifically and analyze resultsliliAbility to effectively communicate technical concepts and results to business audiences in a comprehensive mannerliliAbility to collaborate effectively across multiple teams and stakeholders including analytics teams development teams product management and operationsbrliulMust Havesbrulli13 years experience in building ML based models in a professional environmentliliExperience with productionizing Machine Learning solutions in cloud environmentliliStrong background in Statistics and Operational ResearchliliFamiliarity with Deep Learning algorithmsliliProficiency in coding Python RbrliulstronguPreferred QualificationsbrbrustrongData science machine learning optimization models Masters degree in Machine Learning Computer Science Information Technology Operations Research Statistics Applied Mathematics Econometrics Successful completion of one or more assessments in Python Spark Scala or R using opensource frameworks eg Scikit learn TensorFlow TorchbrbrWere virtualbrbrWorking virtually this year has helped us make quicker decisions remove location barriers across our global team be more flexible in our personal lives and spend less time commuting Today we are reimagining the tech workplace of the future by making a permanent transition to virtual work for most of our team Of course being together in person is an important part of our culture and shared success Well collaborate in person at a regular cadence and with purposebrbrBenefits amp PerksbrbrBeyond competitive pay you can receive incentive awards for your performance Other great benefits include 401k match stock purchase plan paid maternity and parental leave PTO multiple health plans associate discounts and much morebrbrEqual Opportunity EmployerbrbrWalmart Inc is an Equal Opportunity Employer  By Choice We believe we are best equipped to help our associates customers and the communities we serve live better when we really know them That means understanding respecting and valuing diversity unique styles experiences identities ideas and opinions  while being inclusive of all peoplebrbrstronguMinimum QualificationsbrbrustrongememOutlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position If none are listed there are no minimum qualifications brbrememOption 1 Bachelors degree in Statistics Economics Analytics Mathematics Computer Science Information Technology or related field and 2brbryears experience in an analytics or related field Option 2 Masters degree in Statistics Economics Analytics Mathematics Computer SciencebrbrInformation Technology or related field Option 3 4 years
